origins.name: Academy
origins.desc: Academics have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. They also learn from their allies, gaining and additional bonus whenever an ally casts their Ability.

origins.name: Chemtech
origins.desc: After dropping below 75% Health, Chemtech champions gain 20% damage reduction, Attack Speed, and regenerate % of their maximum Health for 8 seconds.

origins.name: Clockwork
origins.desc: Your team has increased Attack Speed, with an increase per augment in the Hexcore.

origins.name: Enforcer
origins.desc: Enforcers stun enemies at the start of combat. They break free after 5 seconds, or after losing 40% or their maximum Health. Enforcers will not try to stun enemies who are immune to crowd control effects.

origins.name: Imperial
origins.desc: At the start of combat, the Imperial who dealt the most damage last combat becomes the Tyrant. The Tyrant deals bonus damage. When the Tyrant dies, the Imperial who has dealt the most damage this combat becomes the new Tyrant.

origins.name: Mercenary
origins.desc: Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase vs a player, dice rolls add loot to the chest. The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice.

origins.name: Mutant
origins.desc:
Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.

Voidborne:
(3) Mutants execute targets they damage who are below 20% Health.
(5) And Mutants deal 40% of their damage as true damage.

Bio-Leeching: Your team gains Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt).
(3) 30% Omnivamp
(5) 55% Omnivamp

Voracious Appetite: Mutants grow stronger each time an ally dies.
(3) +20 Attack Damage and Ability Power
(5) +30 Attack Damage and Ability Power

Synaptic Web: The Abilities of Mutants cost less to cast. (Minimum 10 Mana)
(3) 20 Mana less
(5) 40 Mana less
-----------------------------------------
Adrenaline Rush: Mutants' attacks have a chance to trigger 2 additional attacks against their target.
(3) 40% chance
(5) 75% chance
-----------------------------------------
Cybernetic Enhancement: Mutants with at least 1 item gain bonus stats.
(3) 450 Health and 30 Attack Damage
(5) 900 Health and 60 Attack Damage

Metamorphosis: Mutants grow every 2 seconds, gaining bonuses that stack up to 5 times.
(3) +18 Armor and Magic Resist, +2 Attack Damage and Ability Power
(5) +25 Armor and Magic Resist, +4 Attack Damage and Ability Power

origins.name: Scrap
origins.desc: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap champions turn into full items for the rest of combat. Also, your team gains a shield for each component equipped by your team, including those that are part of a full item.

origins.name: Socialite
origins.desc: Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.

origins.name: Syndicate
origins.desc: Certain allies are cloaked in shadows, gaining 55 Armor, 55 Magic Resist and 20% Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt.)

classes.name: Arcanist
classes.desc: Arcanists increase the Ability Power of your team.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.desc:
Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

classes.name: Bodyguard
classes.desc: Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards gain a Shield and taunt adjacent enemies, forcing them to attack the Bodyguard.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.desc: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double the bonus.

classes.name: Challenger
classes.desc: Challengers get bonus Attack Speed. Upon scoring a takedown, Challengers dash to a new target and double this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

classes.name: Colossus
classes.desc: Innate: Colossi are bigger, more powerful, and immune to crowd control effects. However, each Colossus requires 2 team slots.

classes.name: Enchanter
classes.desc: Your team has bonus Magic Resist. Enchanters gain bonus healing and shielding.

classes.name: Innovator
classes.desc: Innovators build a mechanical companion to join the battle. The companion receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Innovators' star levels.

classes.name: Protector
classes.desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast an Ability. This shield doesn't stack.

classes.name: Scholar
classes.desc: Your team gains Mana every 2 seconds.

classes.name: Sniper
classes.desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 hex Attack Range.

Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

classes.name: Twinshot
classes.desc: Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.
